member.name: T:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger
member.summary: This class sends log messages using the Logging Application Block which is part of the Microsoft Enterprise Library. An instance of this class can be retrieved through the class.

member.name: F:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger.logWriter
member.summary: The actual logger. When set to null, no logging will be performed.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.LogWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified .
member.param: The actual logger that mist be used. Use to disable logging.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger.Log(Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Logging.LogEntry)
member.summary: Logs the specified using the pre-configured logger. If is or there is no pre-configured logger, nothing will be logged.
member.param: The entry containing all the information that must be logged.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger.Log(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Logs a message using the pre-configured logger. If there is no pre-configured logger, nothing will be logged.
member.param: The message that must be logged. When this value is empty, nothing will be logged.
The severity of the message.
The category of the message. Use to ignore the value and use the default.
The priority of the message. Use -1 to ignore the value and use the default.
The title of the message. Use to ignore the value and use the default.
The EventId that must be logged. Use -1 to ignore the value and use the default.
The ActivityId that must be logged. Use to ignore the value and use the default.
The Id of the related activity. Use to ignore the value and use the default.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.Logger.Info(System.String)
member.summary:
Logs an informational message using the pre-configured logger. If there is no pre-configured logger, nothing will be logged.
The log message will get the severity .
member.param: The message that must be logged. When this value is empty, nothing will be logged.

member.summary:

The log message will get the severity .
member.param: The message that must be logged. When this value is empty, nothing will be logged.
The category of the message. Use to ignore the value and use the default.

member.param: The message that must be logged. When this value is empty, nothing will be logged.

member.name: T:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.LogManager
member.summary: Manages and gives access to a instance that is capable of logging messages through the Logging Application Block which is part of the Microsoft Enterprise Library.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Logging.LogManager.CreateLogger
member.summary: Creates a new instance of which can be used to send log messages to the Logging Application Block.
